short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display unread notification badges for Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bluesky web app doesn't immediately show the unread notification count so this extension adds a little badge to the extension icon, as well as to the tab icon (can be turned off). Useful when you keep a Bluesky tab open in the background.

The extension's popup shows a summary of unread Bluesky notifications and an option to quickly mark them all as read.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/czekaj/bluesky-notifications-chrome
